## Purpose

To supply a list of inputs for other tables in the database to reference.

This is one of the few tables in the database that has only one simple column.  I contemplated having a code and a separate name, but in this case the data seemed simple enough to not require that.

## Referenced By

- stabilized_input_recipes
- stabilized_inputs
- powder_input_recipes
- powder_inputs
- product_input_recipes
- product_inputs

## Columns

| column name | data type | constraints | purpose |
|:------------|:----------|:------------|:--------|
| input_name | varchar(50) | Primary Key, Not Null | To be both the primary key and the list of input names |
